      public static int vehicleCounter

    • addVehicle

      public void addVehicle(String vehicleID, String routeID, String vType) throws Exception
      Used to add a new vehicle to the list.
      Parameters:
      vehicleID - id of the new vehicle, must be unique.
      routeID - id of the route that the new vehicle is on.
      vType - the type of the new vehicle.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the TraCI connection fails
